translation.en: [Bonachea] I was 15 and a half. It was summer, and I needed a job.
translation.it: Avevo 15 anni e mezzo. Era estate e mi serviva un lavoro. Mia madre disse:

translation.en: My mom said, "Next to Publix is a bakery, a Jewish-Cuban bakery
translation.it: Avevo 15 anni e mezzo. Era estate e mi serviva un lavoro. Mia madre disse: "Accanto a Publix c'è una pasticceria ebrea-cubana

translation.en: with the rye bread, the pumpernickel."
translation.it: con vari tipi di pane di segale".

translation.en: And then they had guayabas, and all that kinda stuff.
translation.it: E poi avevano le guaiava e cose del genere.

translation.en: So I said, "Okay." I went over there.
translation.it: Dissi: "Ok" e ci andai.

translation.en: I met Sal's mom and dad, and uncles. They all owned the bakery.
translation.it: Conobbi i genitori e gli zii di Sal. Possedevano il panificio.

translation.en: The next day, I met Sal.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, conobbi Sal.

translation.en: I just didn't like him. I thought, "Who is this guy with attitude here?"
translation.it: Non mi piacque. Pensai: "Ma chi si crede di essere?"

translation.en: He was supposed to be working in the back.
translation.it: Doveva lavorare nel retro.

translation.en: But he would set up a stool where I worked in the counter
translation.it: Ma metteva uno sgabello al banco, dove lavoravo io,

translation.en: and he'd sit there and watch because I wore this little pink uniform.
translation.it: e si sedeva a guardarmi, nella mia piccola divisa rosa.

translation.en: It was really short. He would sit there and wait for me to bend over.
translation.it: Era molto corta. Si sedeva lì e aspettava che mi chinassi.

translation.en: He spent three weeks trying to get my phone number.
translation.it: Mi chiese il numero di telefono per tre settimane.

translation.en: I said, "I'll give you one number per week."
translation.it: Gli dissi: "Avrai un numero alla settimana".

translation.en: I gave him one number until we went down the line to the seven numbers,
translation.it: E feci così fino a darglieli tutti e sette.

translation.en: then he got my phone number.
translation.it: Così ebbe il mio numero.

translation.en: Most of the time we went out, he didn't have a penny to his name.
translation.it: Quando uscivamo, di solito non aveva un soldo in tasca.

translation.en: He says, "One day I'm gonna have
translation.it: Diceva: "Diventerò ricco,

translation.en: all the money in the world. I'll buy any car I want."
translation.it: avrò tutte le macchine che vorrò".

translation.en: I was like, "Great."
translation.it: E io: "Fantastico".

translation.en: Sal was always up to no good. He was mischievous.
translation.it: Sal è sempre stato un poco di buono.

translation.en: He had just gotten kicked out of Miami High School.
translation.it: Era appena stato cacciato dal liceo di Miami.

translation.en: So he ended up in my high school.
translation.it: Così venne al mio liceo.

translation.en: And I would sit and do his homework, so he wouldn't get in trouble.
translation.it: Io gli facevo i compiti, per evitargli guai.

translation.en: His mother and father don't speak any English.
translation.it: I suoi genitori non parlano inglese.

translation.en: And he would take his report card home and his mother would say,
translation.it: Lui portava a casa la pagella e sua madre chiedeva:

translation.en: "What does that F stand for?"
translation.it: "Cos'è quella F?"

translation.en: "That F stands for Felicidad."
translation.it: "Quella F sta per Felicidad." Felicidad significa felicità,

translation.en: Felicidad means "happy." He got a good grade.
translation.it: "Quella F sta per Felicidad." Felicidad significa felicità, quindi era un bel voto, e gli hanno sempre creduto.

translation.en: And they believed it all these years,
translation.it: quindi era un bel voto, e gli hanno sempre creduto.

translation.en: all those F's, that Sal was doing great in school.
translation.it: Con tutte quelle F, era bravissimo a scuola.

translation.en: Because he was getting Felicidad, Felicidad, Felicidad. [laughs]
translation.it: Prendeva sempre Felicidad.

translation.en: When he wasn't even attending class.
translation.it: Ma non andava neanche a lezione.

translation.en: He would date at least ten girls at the same time before I found out.
translation.it: Usciva con altre dieci ragazze. Lo scoprii dopo.

translation.en: And he got one of the girls pregnant.
translation.it: Una delle ragazze rimase incinta.

translation.en: I wouldn't date him anymore after that.
translation.it: Da allora, smisi di uscire con lui.

translation.en: [man] Gloria and Manolo Magluta were my parents' best friends.
translation.it: Gloria e Manolo Magluta erano i migliori amici dei miei.

translation.en: To me, they were like my parents.
translation.it: Li amavo come i miei genitori.

translation.en: So Sal was like my cousin. Actually, like my brother.
translation.it: Sal era come mio cugino, come mio fratello.

translation.en: Sal's parents, they owned a bakery shop and they worked very hard,
translation.it: I suoi genitori avevano una pasticceria e lavoravano sodo,

translation.en: extremely hard-working people. They were in church two, three times a week.
translation.it: davvero sodo. Andavano a messa due o tre volte la settimana.

translation.en: Here were these amazing parents, but they weren't there all day long.
translation.it: Erano dei genitori fantastici, ma non c'erano mai.

translation.en: I look back now,
translation.it: Se ci ripenso adesso,

translation.en: and that probably started to become the formation
translation.it: probabilmente quello fu alla base

translation.en: of what happened in Sal's life.
translation.it: di ciò che accadde nella vita di Sal.

translation.en: [Bonachea] Every night, Sal would call me. We would chat and he'd read me the Bible.
translation.it: Ogni sera, Sal mi chiamava. Parlavamo e lui mi leggeva la Bibbia.

translation.en: Sal's main concern, always,
translation.it: La sua grande preoccupazione

translation.en: was whether he was going to go to heaven or not.
translation.it: era sapere se sarebbe andato in paradiso o no.

translation.en: He said to me one time that, if you repent,
translation.it: Una volta mi disse che, se ti penti,

translation.en: no matter what bad deeds you do, that you will go to heaven.
translation.it: non importa cosa hai fatto, andrai comunque in paradiso.

translation.en: So I think in his mind, it's like, "I can do anything I want
translation.it: Probabilmente pensava: "Posso fare quello che voglio,

translation.en: as long as later I repent, and I feel bad for what I did,
translation.it: se poi mi pentirò e mi sentirò in colpa, Dio mi perdonerà

translation.en: and then God will forgive me and I will go to heaven."
translation.it: se poi mi pentirò e mi sentirò in colpa, Dio mi perdonerà e andrò in paradiso".

translation.en: I think that things started to go wrong for Sal.
translation.it: Credo che le cose iniziassero ad andare male per Sal.

translation.en: He was hanging around the wrong crowd.
translation.it: Frequentava le persone sbagliate.

translation.en: They sorta struggled, don't do well, end up being high school dropouts.

translation.it: A quel tempo, Willy vendeva marijuana con Sal.

translation.en: Willy was a jovial guy, very nice. Uh, not too smart.
translation.it: Willy era gioviale, simpatico, non molto intelligente.

translation.en: I knew his mother and his father and his brother, Taby.
translation.it: Conoscevo i suoi genitori e suo fratello Taby.

translation.en: Willy and Salvador were always together. They were like family.

translation.it: Trasportavo la marijuana dalla Colombia e la vendevo a loro.

translation.en: But then I stopped.
translation.it: Ma poi smisi.

translation.en: It's not enough money.

translation.it: perché ci voleva molta gente per gestire un carico.

translation.en: [DeFede] They moved from marijuana to cocaine.
translation.it: Passarono dalla marijuana alla coca.

translation.en: I wouldn't have said they were drug dealers.

translation.en: They were buying ounces on the streets and reselling it.
translation.it: Compravano grammi per strada e li rivendevano.

translation.en: Sal was just a regular young guy doing a little hustle on the side.
translation.it: Sal era un tipo normale, un ragazzo che faceva qualche affaruccio.

translation.en: You know, if anybody, I was a drug dealer, right?
translation.it: Se c'era un narcotrafficante, quello ero io!

translation.en: I'm the one bringing in 800 kilos a month.
translation.it: Trasportavo 800 chili al mese.

translation.en: I think that Sal put two and two together.
translation.it: Credo che Sal abbia fatto due più due.

translation.en: My father started telling how I was always traveling.
translation.it: Mio padre iniziò a dire che viaggiavo sempre

translation.it: e che stavo mettendo su un'azienda di banane in Colombia.

translation.it: Sal pensò: "Impossibile. Jorge ha 21 anni

translation.it: e guadagna milioni di dollari al mese. Non vende banane".

translation.en: "Let me talk to your son. Tell him to give me a meeting."
translation.it: Gli disse: "Fammi parlare con tuo figlio".

translation.en: I finally gave him a meeting.
translation.it: Gli diedi un appuntamento.

translation.en: I had about 15 minutes to meet with him. I was in a rush. He was at my office.
translation.it: Avevo 15 minuti da dedicargli. Ero di fretta. Era nel mio ufficio.

translation.en: He said, "Give me a chance. I think I can sell some coke here and there."
translation.it: Disse: "Dammi un'occasione. Posso vendere un po' di coca".

translation.en: I'm like, "Well, how much money do you have?"
translation.it: Gli dissi: "Beh, quanti soldi hai?"

translation.en: And he's like, "I think ten or 20 thousand dollars."
translation.it: "Dieci o venti migliaia di dollari."

translation.en: I literally almost peed in my pants.
translation.it: Me la feci sotto dal ridere.

translation.en: At that time, it was $42,000, in Miami, wholesale for a kilo of cocaine.
translation.it: All'epoca, a Miami un chilo di coca costava 42.000 $ all'ingrosso.

translation.en: I didn't wanna insult him because I've always loved Sal, even today.
translation.it: Non volli insultarlo. Gli ho sempre voluto bene. Ancora oggi.

translation.en: I'm like, "All right, let me see
translation.it: Quindi, gli dissi: "Ok, vediamo

translation.en: if the opportunity arises because now, we really are committed somewhere else."
translation.it: se si presenta un'occasione, perché adesso siamo molto impegnati".

translation.en: My handsome Latin friends, the brothers Falcon, Gus and Willy.

translation.en: [man] In about 1978, my older sister, China, she started dating Taby, Gustavo Falcon.
translation.it: Verso il 1978, mia sorella maggiore, China, iniziò a frequentare Taby, Gustavo Falcon.

translation.en: As soon as she turned 18, my sister and Taby got married.
translation.it: Appena compì 18 anni, lei e Taby si sposarono.

translation.en: Through Taby, I met his older brother Willy Falcon.
translation.it: Attraverso Taby, conobbi il fratello maggiore, Willy.

translation.it: E attraverso Willy conobbi il suo migliore amico, Sal Magluta.

translation.en: I grew up in Little Havana when we came from Cuba.
translation.it: Siamo di Cuba, ma sono cresciuto a Little Havana.

translation.en: It was like the Cuban ghetto.
translation.it: Era come il ghetto cubano.

translation.en: [reporter] Among Latins in South Florida, particularly Cubans,
translation.it: I latini del sud della Florida, in particolare i cubani,

translation.en: there is a lingual reference to different aspects of community life.
translation.it: hanno dei termini per molti aspetti della vita della comunità.

translation.en: Police are called la jara.
translation.it: La polizia si chiama "la jara".

translation.en: The Federal Bureau of Investigation is la federica.
translation.it: L'FBI è "la federica".

translation.en: And when talking about a gun, Latins say, la fuca.
translation.it: E se si parla di una pistola, i latini dicono "la fuca".

translation.en: [Rosello] My parents didn't know English. So it was hard for us growing up.
translation.it: I miei non parlavano inglese. Per noi, crescendo, è stato difficile.

translation.en: My dad had two jobs. He would leave at seven in the morning
translation.it: Mio padre aveva due lavori. Usciva alle sette

translation.en: and get back at ten o'clock at night.
translation.it: e tornava alle dieci di sera.

translation.en: I saw my dad working so hard.
translation.it: Vedevo mio padre lavorare tanto. Non volevo diventare come lui,

translation.en: That's not what I wanted to do when I was a kid growing up.
translation.it: Vedevo mio padre lavorare tanto. Non volevo diventare come lui, da piccolo. Non volevo avere due lavori.

translation.en: I didn't wanna have two jobs.
translation.it: da piccolo. Non volevo avere due lavori.

translation.en: But now, I was Willy and Taby Falcon's little brother.
translation.it: Ma adesso ero il fratellino di Willy e Taby Falcon.

translation.en: I hung out with Taby, like, on a daily basis.
translation.it: Vedevo Taby ogni giorno.

translation.en: After school, I would go to their house. Willy's friends would come by.
translation.it: Dopo la scuola, andavo a casa loro. Gli amici di Willy passavano.

translation.en: I would wash their cars and get paid 20 bucks.

translation.en: Expensive Corvettes, Cadillacs, Porsches.
translation.it: Auto costose, Corvette, Cadillac, Porsche.

translation.en: So on a Saturday and Sunday, I would make like $200 in two days.
translation.it: Nei fine settimana guadagnavo 200 dollari in due giorni.

translation.en: My dad would make $200 probably in three weeks.
translation.it: Mio padre forse li guadagnava in tre settimane.

translation.en: So, I'm like, "Oh, this is good," you know?
translation.it: Pensavo: "Ehi, questo mi piace".

translation.en: I mean, whatever they're doing, it's paying off.

translation.en: A lot of Willy's friends, they would taunt me, you know?
translation.it: Molti amici di Willy si burlavano di me:

translation.en: They would go in and go, "Pegy, here look what I got in here."
translation.it: "Pegy, guarda cosa c'è qui dentro".

translation.en: They opened the shoe box and it was all money, and I'm, like, "Damn." You know?
translation.it: Aprivano una scatola di scarpe ed era piena di soldi, e io: "Cavolo!"

translation.en: Right then and there, I knew what they were doing. I knew it was drugs.
translation.it: In quel momento capii come facevano. Droga.

translation.en: The city of Miami in 1978 and 1979,
translation.it: A Miami, nel 1978 e nel 1979, una serie di detective della narcotici

translation.it: A Miami, nel 1978 e nel 1979, una serie di detective della narcotici avevano ottenuto il permesso da un giudice

translation.it: avevano ottenuto il permesso da un giudice

translation.en: a wiretap investigation involving a number of drug traffickers.
translation.it: per intercettare un certo numero di narcotrafficanti.

translation.en: This operation was coined Operation Video Canary.
translation.it: L'operazione si chiamò Video Canary.

translation.en: [reporter] The state attorney's office got its first lead last August
translation.it: In agosto, la procura ha ricevuto una soffiata

translation.it: che ha portato agenti sotto copertura al palazzo della Capital Bank.

translation.it: fu quando seppero di loro per la prima volta.

translation.en: All they know about Sal and Willy is that they were selling ounces or a kilo.
translation.it: Fino ad allora sapevano solo che Sal e Willy vendevano grammi, o un chilo. Non erano grandi quantità.
