translation.it: vendevano grammi, o un chilo. Non erano grandi quantità.

translation.en: That investigation was not centered on Falcon and Magluta.
translation.it: Quell'indagine non era incentrata su Falcon e Magluta.

translation.en: [reporter] More than 120 suspects were expected to be brought in,
translation.it: Dovevano essere arrestati oltre 120 sospettati,

translation.en: 43 of whom are from Dade County.
translation.it: 43 dei quali della contea di Dade.

translation.en: [Clark] Falcon and Magluta were among those arrested
translation.it: Falcon e Magluta furono arrestati

translation.en: and charged in the state system in Miami, Florida
translation.it: e incriminati nel sistema statale di Miami,

translation.en: with state drug trafficking charges.
translation.it: con l'accusa di traffico di droga.

translation.en: [Valdes] When they got busted, I don't believe the government had any idea
translation.it: Quando li arrestarono, non credo che il governo avesse idea

translation.en: what Sal and Willy were all about. They're clueless what's going on in Miami.
translation.it: di cosa facessero Sal e Willy. Non sapevano cosa accadesse a Miami.

translation.en: [Clark] They were given a probationary sentence of five years,
translation.it: Li condannarono a cinque anni di libertà vigilata.

translation.en: a special condition of which they serve 14 months.
translation.it: Una condizione speciale per cui si scontano 14 mesi.

translation.en: What it was, it was like a joke.
translation.it: Era uno scherzo. Non era niente.

translation.en: It was like, "This is nothing. This is kiddy play."
translation.it: Era uno scherzo. Non era niente. Un gioco da ragazzi.

translation.en: [DeFede] Willy and Sal got out on bail.
translation.it: Willy e Sal uscirono su cauzione.

translation.en: But what their attorneys were also able to do, was to keep the case on appeal for years.
translation.it: Ma i loro avvocati riuscirono anche a tenere il caso in appello per anni.

translation.en: The likelihood of them ever prevailing was nil.
translation.it: Le probabilità che riuscissero a vincere erano zero.

translation.en: However, this did buy them time.
translation.it: Tuttavia, guadagnarono tempo.

translation.en: And they continued to traffic in drugs pretty much unabated throughout the 1980s.
translation.it: E continuarono a trafficare droga praticamente senza sosta negli anni '80.

translation.en: [DeFede] They were still out on the streets, selling cocaine, and this began a real theme for them.
translation.it: Erano ancora in giro a vendere cocaina, e questo diede loro una certa fama.

translation.en: That they were almost untouchable. Like they were walking between raindrops.
translation.it: Di essere quasi intoccabili, invulnerabili.

translation.en: And that's really the story of Willy and Sal.
translation.it: Ed è proprio la storia di Willy e Sal.

translation.en: At that time, a load had come in and we were down to 30 kilos.
translation.it: Una volta, mi era arrivato un carico e ne erano rimasti 30 chili.

translation.en: All of a sudden, we had these 30 kilos I had to get rid of
translation.it: All'improvviso, ebbi bisogno di sbarazzarmene perché il giorno dopo

translation.en: because the following day, I'm leaving for Europe.
translation.it: ebbi bisogno di sbarazzarmene perché il giorno dopo sarei andato in Europa.

translation.en: Sal comes over with Willy and I said, "You want a chance?"
translation.it: E così dissi a Sal e Willy: "Volete un'occasione?"

translation.en: And he's like, "Yeah, thanks." I said, "Okay, here it is, 30 kilos."
translation.it: "Sì, grazie!" "Ok, tenete, sono 30 chili."

translation.en: Sal did not wanna do it.
translation.it: Sal non voleva farlo.

translation.en: Sal didn't think they could sell 30 kilos of cocaine.
translation.it: Sal non pensava di poter vendere 30 chili di coca.

translation.en: He's like, "Oh, my God! No, too much." But Willy jumped up and he's like,
translation.it: Disse: "Dio! No, sono troppi". Ma Willy balzò in piedi e disse:

translation.en: "That's nothing."
translation.it: "Non sono niente".

translation.en: "Trust me. Don't worry. It's Miami, we'll figure it out."
translation.it: "Tranquillo. Siamo a Miami, ce la faremo."

translation.en: And Sal looked at him like…
translation.it: E Sal lo guardò dicendo:

translation.en: [chuckles] "You've probably been snorting a bit too much."
translation.it: "Devi aver sniffato troppo".

translation.en: Sal's got more reservation about what he can do,
translation.it: Sal era meno sicuro di poterlo fare,

translation.en: possibly because Willy knew more people than he did.
translation.it: forse perché Willy conosceva più persone di lui.

translation.en: Willy was just the face.
translation.it: Willy aveva una bella faccia.

translation.en: He loved to brag. Not a lot of brains, but everybody loved Willy, right?
translation.it: Gli piaceva vantarsi. Non aveva molto cervello, ma lo amavano tutti.

translation.en: Thirty days later the guy came back. They had $1.2 million for him
translation.it: Tornò dopo 30 giorni. Avevano 1,2 milioni di dollari per lui

translation.en: in return for the 30 kilos that he had sold them.
translation.it: in cambio dei 30 chili che gli aveva venduto.

translation.en: They came with all the money. And I was very shocked.
translation.it: Arrivarono con i soldi. Ne fui molto scioccato.

translation.en: "Hey, when can we have some more?"
translation.it: "Quando possiamo averne ancora?"

translation.en: [DeFede] There was never any discussion after that as to whether they could actually handle
translation.it: Da allora non ci furono più dubbi sul fatto che potessero gestire

translation.en: the amount the providers could give to them.
translation.it: le quantità che gli venivano affidate.

translation.en: [Valdes] Sal got confidence quickly.
translation.it: Sal acquistò fiducia in fretta. La prima volta che fai qualcosa,

translation.en: When you try to do something the first time, you don't think you can.
translation.it: Sal acquistò fiducia in fretta. La prima volta che fai qualcosa, sei insicuro. Ma dopo ti dici: "Non è stato difficile".

translation.en: Once you do it, you're like, "That was not hard."
translation.it: sei insicuro. Ma dopo ti dici: "Non è stato difficile".

translation.en: They went from selling grams, to selling 30 kilos.
translation.it: Passarono da vendere grammi a vendere 30 chili.

translation.en: How did these people go from party boy, to becoming a major drug lord,
translation.it: Come riuscirono questi due festaioli a diventare dei signori della droga

translation.en: making a million dollars a month?
translation.it: da un milione di dollari al mese?

translation.en: Very quickly.
translation.it: In un lampo.

translation.en: Little did we begin to see that demand would explode and it was fast.
translation.it: Presto capimmo che la domanda sarebbe esplosa. E fu in fretta.

translation.en: [DeFede] The demand was insatiable. It was like an eruption.
translation.it: La richiesta era insaziabile. Fu come un'eruzione.

translation.en: [reporter] Americans consume more than 50 tons of cocaine every year,
translation.it: Gli americani consumano oltre 50 tonnellate di coca all'anno,

translation.en: spending nearly $40 billion for the illicit drug.
translation.it: spendendo quasi 40 miliardi di dollari.

translation.en: [Valdes] It started in California where you got movie stars, celebrities, singers.
translation.it: Iniziò in California, dove c'erano star del cinema, celebrità, cantanti.

translation.en: New York City where you have nightclubs, where you have Wall Street.
translation.it: A New York, con i locali notturni e Wall Street.

translation.en: What was Miami?
translation.it: E Miami?

translation.en: There was no night life. It was two, three little nightclubs of high school kids.
translation.it: Non c'era vita notturna. Giusto due o tre discoteche per liceali.

translation.en: South Beach did not exist. To imagine selling 30 kilos in Miami, it's crazy.
translation.it: South Beach non esisteva. Immaginare di vendere 30 chili a Miami è pazzesco.

translation.en: Sal comes into the picture of Miami.
translation.it: Ma sulla scena di Miami entrò Sal.

translation.en: He starts bringing all his young friends around to go and party and to show off.
translation.it: Portò in giro tutti i suoi amici a fare festa e mettersi in mostra.

translation.en: Sal and Willy developed the Miami cocaine market.
translation.it: Sal e Willy svilupparono il mercato della coca a Miami.

translation.en: They got a huge reputation very quick.
translation.it: Si fecero presto una reputazione.

translation.en: Success in any business venture involves elements of hard work as well as luck.
translation.it: Il successo in qualsiasi impresa comporta duro lavoro e fortuna.

translation.en: Falcon and Magluta benefited from luck
translation.it: Falcon e Magluta sfruttarono la loro fortuna e la sfortuna

translation.en: and the misfortune of one of their colleagues, Jorge Valdes.
translation.it: Falcon e Magluta sfruttarono la loro fortuna e la sfortuna di uno dei loro colleghi, Jorge Valdes.

translation.en: He was arrested and he received a sentence of between five and ten years.
translation.it: Fu arrestato e condannato a scontare tra i cinque e i dieci anni.

translation.en: But then he had to turn his business over to somebody.
translation.it: Dovette affidare la sua attività a qualcuno.

translation.en: When I got convicted, they let me out on bail. Logically,
translation.it: Mi fecero uscire su cauzione. Ovviamente,

translation.en: I didn't have anybody else to handle operation that I thought
translation.it: non potevo pensare a nessun altro

translation.en: could handle the level of what I was doing.
translation.it: in grado di gestire il mio livello d'affari.

translation.en: So I got together with Sal and I told him, I said, "Here's my buyers in California."
translation.it: Così incontrai Sal e gli dissi: "Ecco i miei compratori in California".

translation.en: And I introduced him to my connection in the Medellin cartel.
translation.it: Gli presentai il mio contatto con il cartello di Medellín.

translation.en: [Clark] This was the break that launched Falcon and Magluta into the big time,
translation.it: Questa fu la svolta che portò Falcon e Magluta nel grande giro,

translation.en: now that they had Valdes' exclusive contact with the Medellin cartel.
translation.it: ora che avevano il contatto di Valdes con il cartello di Medellín.

translation.en: Now they had unlimited access to large quantities of cocaine
translation.it: Ora avevano accesso illimitato a enormi quantità di cocaina

translation.en: that the Colombian cartel needed to have transported successfully
translation.it: che il cartello colombiano doveva far trasportare negli USA.

translation.en: into the United States.
translation.it: doveva far trasportare negli USA.

translation.en: Imagine if they thought selling 30 kilos was something crazy out of this world.
translation.it: Pensavano che vendere 30 chili fosse stata un'impresa pazzesca.

translation.en: Suddenly now, they're going to be running an empire.
translation.it: Di colpo, si ritrovarono a dover gestire un impero.

translation.en: Man, next week, there's 800 kilos coming.
translation.it: La settimana dopo sarebbero arrivati 800 chili.

translation.en: All they have to do is find a pilot with a plane.
translation.it: Serviva solo un pilota con un aereo.

translation.en: [man] I had a part-time job doing banners
translation.it: Avevo un lavoro part-time, portavo striscioni.

translation.en: up and down Miami Beach.
translation.it: Su e giù per Miami Beach.

translation.en: And that paid $3 an hour.
translation.it: Guadagnavo tre dollari l'ora.

translation.en: I went to Miami High with Willy and Sal. We just became friends.
translation.it: Andavo al Miami High con Willy e Sal. Diventammo amici.

translation.en: Years later, we started talking.
translation.it: Anni dopo, iniziammo a parlare.

translation.en: We discussed, what kind of plane would you use for smuggling?
translation.it: Parlammo del tipo di aereo da usare per il contrabbando.

translation.en: I started doing some research as to what kind of plane, what kind of equipment.
translation.it: Feci delle ricerche sul tipo di aereo e di dotazioni.

translation.en: I said, "Look, this is what you need and this is how much it's gonna cost."
translation.it: Poi dissi loro: "Questo è quello che vi serve e questo è quanto costerà".

translation.en: And he says, "Okay, well,
translation.it: "Ok, va bene.

translation.en: let's do it."
translation.it: Procediamo."

translation.en: Everything was prepared, the Colombians were ready,
translation.it: Preparammo tutto, i colombiani erano pronti.

translation.en: 'cause they need a few days to clear the runways
translation.it: Avevano bisogno di alcuni giorni per farsi strada tra l'esercito e i guerriglieri

translation.en: between the army and the leftist guerrillas
translation.it: per farsi strada tra l'esercito e i guerriglieri

translation.en: and bring the merchandise to where it's supposed to be.
translation.it: e portare la merce al posto stabilito.

translation.en: Opa Locka Airport was full of smugglers.
translation.it: L'aeroporto era pieno di trafficanti.

translation.en: [Posada] Everybody there was working.
translation.it: Erano tutti nel giro.

translation.en: [Linero] Cuban smugglers walking around, all were wearing cowboy boots.
translation.it: Tutti i trafficanti cubani indossavano stivali da cowboy,

translation.en: All were wearing beepers. All were wearing Rolex.
translation.it: portavano un cerca persone e un Rolex.

translation.en: All were wearing cowboy hats.
translation.it: E un cappello da cowboy. Da lì il nome "cowboy della coca",

translation.en: And I think that's where the "cocaine cowboys" came to be known as.
translation.it: E un cappello da cowboy. Da lì il nome "cowboy della coca", con cui diventarono famosi. Era una divisa.

translation.en: It was a uniform.
translation.it: con cui diventarono famosi. Era una divisa.

translation.en: Going to Colombia, it was a ten-hour flight.
translation.it: Per andare in Colombia ci volevano dieci ore.

translation.en: So we had about 400 gallons of fuel in about eight tanks.
translation.it: Avevamo 1500 litri di carburante in otto taniche.

translation.en: I'm in a flying bomb.
translation.it: Volavo su una bomba.

translation.en: In Colombia, it is illegal to fly a private airplane after five o'clock.
translation.it: In Colombia, è illegale pilotare un aereo privato dopo le cinque.

translation.en: So, basically, everybody knows that this plane that's flying at six o'clock
translation.it: Quindi, in pratica, tutti sapevano che quell'aereo che volava alle sei

translation.en: is a smuggler plane.
translation.it: era di un trafficante.

translation.en: You look down, everybody is giving you signals.
translation.it: Guardando in basso, vedevi segnali ovunque.

translation.en: They're burning tires.
translation.it: Bruciavano le gomme.

translation.en: So you have to precisely be
translation.it: Quindi dovevi trovarti esattamente

translation.en: where you need to be, or otherwise,
translation.it: dove dovevi essere,

translation.en: you're gonna die.
translation.it: o saresti morto.

translation.en: I made my approach and I'm pretty confident that I got the runway,
translation.it: Mi avvicinai, sicuro di aver trovato la pista,

translation.en: which is not really a runway.
translation.it: che non era proprio una pista.

translation.en: So, I landed,
translation.it: Atterrai,

translation.en: get out, people start putting grass on top of the airplane and so on.
translation.it: e alcune persone coprirono l'aereo con dell'erba.

translation.en: In the morning, we get to the plane,
translation.it: Al mattino, arrivammo all'aereo,

translation.en: and here comes these three or four Jeeps
translation.it: ed ecco arrivare tre o quattro Jeep piene di borsoni,

translation.en: full of duffel bags, each carrying about 30 to 40 kilos of cocaine.
translation.it: tre o quattro Jeep piene di borsoni, ognuno con circa 30 o 40 chili di cocaina.

translation.en: Plane is loaded, ready to go.
translation.it: Caricarono l'aereo. Ero pronto.

translation.en: Now, we're almost 1,500 pounds over the gross weight of the airplane.
translation.it: Ma pesavamo circa 700 chili oltre la portata massima dell'aereo.

translation.en: "Are you out of your mind? This could not happen."
translation.it: "Sei fuori di testa? Non è possibile."

translation.en: Well, it's happening, okay?
translation.it: Beh, invece sì, ok?

translation.en: We were doing lines right on the top of the dashboard where the instruments are.
translation.it: Facemmo delle linee sul cruscotto della strumentazione.

translation.en: Some beautiful, big, thick lines of cocaine.
translation.it: Delle belle linee di cocaina, grosse e spesse.

translation.en: People fly high, you know? I can't understand that.
translation.it: La gente vola fatta. Non riesco a capirlo.

translation.en: [Linero] You need to be very aware of what's going on in the plane.
translation.it: Devi essere molto consapevole di quello che succede sull'aereo.

translation.en: As I'm high and paranoid, I could feel a little change on the engine in my ass.
translation.it: Se sono fatto e paranoico, posso sentire ogni piccolo cambiamento nel motore sotto di me.

translation.en: If there was a vibration, I could look at the gauges
translation.it: Se ci fosse una vibrazione, potrei guardare gli strumenti

translation.en: and see that this is okay and that's fine here.
translation.it: e vedere se va tutto bene.

translation.en: I think that being high helped a lot.
translation.it: Credo che essere fatto fosse di grande aiuto.

translation.en: He must have been out of his mind.
translation.it: Doveva essere fuori di testa.

translation.en: There was a time that I was making about one or two trips a month.
translation.it: Ci fu un periodo in cui facevo uno o due viaggi al mese.

translation.en: We're talking about 800 keys a month.
translation.it: Parliamo di circa un quintale al mese.

translation.en: I was basically making around 200 grand per trip.
translation.it: Guadagnavo circa 200.000 dollari a viaggio.

translation.en: Willy, he wanted me to go every week
translation.it: Willy voleva che andassi ogni settimana,

translation.en: but it's like, how many times can you go into bullfighting and not get hurt?
translation.it: ma quante volte puoi lottare contro un toro senza farti male?

translation.en: [Rosello] They used to bring the coke from Colombia to Freeport.
translation.it: Portavano la coca dalla Colombia a Freeport.

translation.en: From Freeport, they would bring the coke to Miami in speedboats.
translation.it: Da Freeport, portavano la coca a Miami in motoscafo.

translation.en: The guy on the boat was Juan Barroso,
translation.it: Il tizio sulla barca era Juan Barroso.

translation.en: that used to race with Seahawk. He used to bring in the coke.
translation.it: Gareggiavano con la Seahawk. Portava la coca.

translation.en: Okay, now we have the smallest navigator in offshore racing,
translation.it: Ecco il navigatore più piccolo delle gare offshore,

translation.en: and it's Johnny "Recut." Here we go.
translation.it: Johnny "Recut". Ecco qua.

translation.en: My name is Juan Barroso, right? They call me "Recut."
translation.it: Il mio nome è Juan Barroso. Mi chiamano "Recut".

translation.en: Like if he was recut, you know, like if they cut him. [laughs]
translation.it: "Tagliato", perché è basso. Come se lo avessero tagliato.

translation.en: [Linero] One time when he got in, Willy got a couple of phone books
translation.it: Una volta, Willy prese un paio di elenchi telefonici

translation.en: and put him on his seat with duct tape and he was screaming and yelling.
translation.it: e lo legò sul sedile con il nastro adesivo mentre lui urlava.

translation.en: And we were all laughing.
translation.it: Ridevamo tutti.

translation.en: As you can see, we standing up.
translation.it: Come potete vedere, siamo in piedi.

translation.en: You know, we had to make a special booster for him, but he's learning very little.
translation.it: Abbiamo dovuto fare un rialzo speciale per lui, ma sta imparando davvero poco.

translation.en: He's learning by the time that he's got a big mouth.
translation.it: Col tempo imparerà che parla troppo.

translation.en: Willy and me, we used to know each other from high school.
translation.it: Willy e io ci conoscevamo dal liceo.

translation.en: [Rosello] Willy says, "You have Recut in the boat, he probably weighs 80 pounds.
translation.it: Willy disse: "Mettiamo Recut sulla barca, peserà 40 chili.

translation.en: He's this short.
translation.it: È basso così.

translation.en: You won't get drag from the wind, so you'd get a little advantage."
translation.it: Il vento non ti trascinerà via, questo ti darà un vantaggio".

translation.en: We took our boat down to Nassau, and we took an aerodynamic.
translation.it: Abbiamo portato la barca a Nassau per darle aerodinamica.

translation.en: And the boat was running fast, but we needed a shorter navigator
translation.it: La barca ora è più veloce, ma serviva un navigatore più basso

translation.en: so the air would pass through, so we had to get a shorter person.
translation.it: per far passare l'aria, e ne abbiamo trovato uno.

translation.en: How old are you?
translation.it: Quanti anni hai?

translation.en: -Eleven. -How old are you?
translation.it: - Undici. - E tu?

translation.en: -Twenty-nine. -He's bigger than you?
translation.it: - Ventinove. - È più grande di te?

translation.en: He's a little bigger.
translation.it: È un po' più grande.

translation.en: -You're full of shit. -[all laugh]
translation.it: Dici solo cazzate.

translation.en: There was a guy that worked for him, Justo Jay.
translation.it: C'era un tizio che lavorava per lui, Justo Jay.

translation.en: We started talking and he tell me, "Hey, Willy wants to meet with you."
translation.it: Iniziammo a parlare e mi disse: "Willy ti vuole incontrare".

translation.en: Willy told me, "We got some stuff that's coming through Freeport, Bahamas."
translation.it: E Willy mi disse: "Abbiamo qualcosa in arrivo da Freeport, Bahamas.

translation.en: "Can you do it for me?" "Yeah."
translation.it: Ci pensi tu?" "Sì."

translation.en: It was the first load I did with cocaine with him.
translation.it: Fu il primo carico di coca che portai per lui.

translation.en: I made like 250 grand.
translation.it: Guadagnai 250.000 dollari.

translation.en: In one night.
translation.it: In una notte.

translation.en: I would go down to Freeport. You go across the island.
translation.it: Andavo a Freeport, dall'altra parte dell'isola.

translation.en: Then he'd meet me with a little boat and he'd put the stuff in.
translation.it: Era lì su una barchetta, caricava la roba.

translation.en: Outta there.
translation.it: Fuori di lì.

translation.en: I go over by the Keys.
translation.it: Andavo alle Keys.

translation.en: I saw people, they transported it and put it in trucks.
translation.it: Dei tipi la prendevano e la mettevano sui camion.

translation.en: They bring it over to Miami.
translation.it: E la portavano a Miami.

translation.en: [Rosello] '81, Willy and Sal were already big.
translation.it: Nel 1981, Willy e Sal erano già importanti.

translation.en: Justo Jay was the one that took care of the loads that came in.
translation.it: Justo Jay era il responsabile dei carichi in arrivo,

translation.en: He took care of the stash houses. He used to take care of everything.
translation.it: dei depositi, di ogni cosa.

translation.en: He's like, "I'm gonna pick you up, I want you to help me do something there."
translation.it: Disse: "Vengo a prenderti. Mi devi aiutare a fare una cosa".

translation.en: I get in the car. We get to the house.
translation.it: Salgo in macchina. Arriviamo a casa.

translation.en: He's like, "I need you to help me count some money."
translation.it: Mi dice: "Aiutami a contare dei soldi".

translation.en: He takes the money out of the safe,
translation.it: Prende i soldi dalla cassaforte,

translation.en: tells me how to count money and how to keep ledgers.
translation.it: mi dice come contare i soldi e come tenere i registri.

translation.en: There was times where we counted up to five million dollars
translation.it: A volte contavamo cinque milioni di dollari,

translation.en: twice a week.
translation.it: due volte a settimana.

translation.en: And I was 15 years old.
translation.it: Avevo 15 anni.

translation.en: If the counting machine would break, like five or six hours.
translation.it: Se la macchina conta soldi si rompeva, ci mettevamo cinque o sei ore.

translation.en: And the next day, my thumbs would be swollen from counting.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo avevo i pollici gonfi.

translation.en: Growing up, you see your parents going through hard times,
translation.it: Avevo visto i miei genitori vivere momenti difficili,

translation.en: and then you're in a room with three or four million dollars,
translation.it: poi ero lì con tre o quattro milioni.

translation.en: I mean, how are you gonna say no to that, you know?
translation.it: Come si fa a dire di no?

translation.en: [Jefede] Everyone at that time had a friend or a friend of a friend
translation.it: Tutti, all'epoca, avevano un amico o un conoscente nel giro della droga

translation.en: who was in the drug business seeming to get rich overnight.
translation.it: Tutti, all'epoca, avevano un amico o un conoscente nel giro della droga che diventava ricco di colpo.

translation.en: A lot of these kids, they're first-generation immigrants.
translation.it: Molti erano immigrati di prima generazione.

translation.en: They thought this was their path to the American dream.
translation.it: Credevano che quello fosse il sogno americano.

translation.en: If you would've told us we were criminal, we would have laughed.
translation.it: Se ci avessero dato dei criminali, avremmo riso.

translation.en: We're 20-year-old kids! We're just having fun.
translation.it: Siamo ventenni! Ci stiamo solo divertendo.

translation.en: [announcer] And there he is, Justo Jay, Willy Falcon, doing a fine job in the Seahawk V-Bottom.
translation.it: Eccoli, Justo Jay, Willy Falcon, che vanno alla grande con la loro Seahawk.

translation.en: I'm very much responsible for them getting involved in racing.
translation.it: Sono il responsabile del loro coinvolgimento nelle gare.

translation.en: I started racing boats.
translation.it: Iniziai a gareggiare.

translation.en: One day, Willy came over, he saw all the fun we were having.
translation.it: Un giorno, Willy venne e vide come ci divertivamo.

translation.en: And he goes, "Hey, can we do this?" And we started a company.
translation.it: Disse: "Vogliamo farlo insieme?" E avviamo una società.

translation.en: [Rosello] Willy and Sal bought a boat company, Seahawk.
translation.it: Willy e Sal comprarono un'azienda di barche, la Seahawk.

translation.en: [young Linero] It's the hottest thing around. [reporter] It seems to be.
translation.it: - È la cosa più in voga ultimamente. - Sembra di sì.

translation.en: It was appealing to drug smugglers, 'cause it's an expensive sport.
translation.it: Attirava i trafficanti di droga perché è uno sport costoso.

translation.en: [DeFede] Who else could afford it?
translation.it: Chi, se non loro?

translation.en: The toys are more expensive, but they're toys, right?
translation.it: Sono più costosi, ma sono pur sempre dei giocattoli.

translation.en: [Rosello] You do, say, nine races a year. One race could cost you a million dollars.
translation.it: Facciamo, per esempio, nove gare all'anno. Possono costare un milione l'una.

translation.en: If you're a drug dealer, why would you wanna race boats?
translation.it: Se sei un narcotrafficante, perché ti dai alle gare?

translation.en: How the hell you gonna justify
translation.it: Come puoi giustificare una spesa di milioni di dollari

translation.en: spending a million dollars racing boats and you don't have a job?
translation.it: Come puoi giustificare una spesa di milioni di dollari per i motoscafi se non hai un lavoro?

translation.en: [Linero] Sal got a boat, and they went and they got another boat.
translation.it: Sal comprò una barca e poi ne comprarono un'altra.

translation.en: And forget about everybody else, the race was between Willy and Sal
translation.it: E dimenticate tutti gli altri, la gara era tra Willy e Sal,

translation.en: in different boats. That was the race.
translation.it: su barche diverse. Ecco la gara.

translation.en: [announcer] There you see it, Seahawk Two makes a move on Seahawk One.
translation.it: Ecco, Seahawk Due fa una mossa su Seahawk Uno.

translation.en: Willy Falcon makes a bid for the lead over Sal Magluta and Sal answers the challenge.
translation.it: Willy Falcon sfida Sal Magluta e Sal non si tira indietro.

translation.en: [Rosello] And they had Taby, Recut,
translation.it: E avevano Taby, Recut,

translation.en: Jay, and Ralph Linero.
translation.it: Jay, e Ralph Linero.

translation.en: They call him cabeza because he's got a big head.
translation.it: Lo chiamano cabeza perché ha la testa grossa.

translation.en: The racing helmet, it had to be custom made 'cause none of them fit.
translation.it: Il casco doveva essere fatto su misura, o non gli andava.

translation.en: Sometimes when we finish a race,
translation.it: A volte, finivamo una gara

translation.en: we got a couple of planes coming in about a day with 400 keys.
translation.it: e il giorno dopo avevamo un paio di aerei in arrivo con 400 chili.

translation.en: [DeFede] Willy won one national title, Sal was a three-time champion.
translation.it: Willy vinse un titolo nazionale, Sal ne vinse tre.

translation.en: [Barroso] We won the world championship.
translation.it: Vincemmo il campionato del mondo.

translation.en: Man, that was the best feeling you ever had.
translation.it: Cavolo, non mi ero mai sentito così.

translation.en: [announcer] There's your winner in the Open Class National Champions
translation.it: Ecco il vincitore per due anni di fila nel campionato nazionale in classe open

translation.en: two years in a row, and in modified class before that.
translation.it: Ecco il vincitore per due anni di fila nel campionato nazionale in classe open e, prima, in classe modificata.

translation.en: [DeFede] At one point,
translation.it: A un certo punto,

translation.en: two-thirds of the champions of the powerboat racing circuit
translation.it: credo che due terzi dei campioni delle gare di fuoribordo

translation.en: were also all either soon-to-be or had just been convicted drug smugglers.
translation.it: fossero stati condannati per traffico di droga, o lo sarebbero stati.

translation.en: Certainly, when you finish racing, win, lose, or draw,
translation.it: Che tu vinca o perda, alla fine di una gara

translation.en: you come home to a beautiful family, so you can't really lose.
translation.it: ti aspetta una bella famiglia, quindi non perdi mai.

translation.en: No way.
translation.it: No.

translation.en: [Linero] It was the family business. I know that these guys will do
translation.it: Erano affari di famiglia. Avrebbero fatto di tutto per me,

translation.en: whatever they could for me, and I would do whatever I could for them.
translation.it: Avrebbero fatto di tutto per me, e io avrei fatto di tutto per loro.

translation.en: [Rosello] Willy's wife, Alina, had three sisters.
translation.it: La moglie di Willy, Alina, aveva tre sorelle.

translation.en: Sal's wife, Isabelita, had three sisters.
translation.it: E anche la moglie di Sal, Isabelita.

translation.en: Their husbands or boyfriends worked for the company or had a connection.
translation.it: I loro uomini lavoravano per l'azienda, magari indirettamente.

translation.en: My daughter, Rachel, is married to Sal's nephew.
translation.it: Mia figlia, Rachel, è sposata con il nipote di Sal.

translation.en: We're very close.
translation.it: Siamo molto uniti.

translation.en: [reporter] Sal Magluta. A man who has more to smile about than just his race boat.
translation.it: Sal Magluta, un uomo che non sorride solo per il suo motoscafo.

translation.en: Who do we have here today?
translation.it: Chi c'è qui oggi?

translation.en: [Sal] I have my oldest son, Chris,
translation.it: Il mio figlio maggiore, Chris,

translation.en: my little twins, Michael and Michelle, a boy and a girl.
translation.it: i miei gemelli, Michael e Michelle, un maschio e una femmina.

translation.en: -And don't forget. -Oh, and the wife here, Isabel.
translation.it: - E non dimenticare… - Oh, e mia moglie, Isabel.

translation.en: [Rosello] My little sister used to keep the books for Taby. She was 14 years old.
translation.it: Mia sorella teneva i libri contabili per Taby. Aveva 14 anni.

translation.en: I mean, it was something that was kept very into the family. No outsiders.
translation.it: Insomma, era qualcosa che tenevamo molto dentro la famiglia. Niente estranei.

translation.en: Bye! Bye!
translation.it: Ciao!

translation.en: Bye! Bye!
translation.it: Ciao!

translation.en: [Rosello] We were a close family, we did everything together. I mean, everything.
translation.it: Eravamo una famiglia unita, facevamo tutto insieme. Cioè, tutto.

translation.en: We used to go to Vail twice, three times a year.
translation.it: Andavamo a Vail due o tre volte l'anno.

translation.en: I mean, my family, my sister. I mean, we never had to pay for anything.
translation.it: La mia famiglia, mia sorella. Non abbiamo mai dovuto pagare niente.

translation.en: [DeFede] Willy and Sal, what set them apart,
translation.it: Una cosa che distingueva Will e Sal

translation.en: was that they really did view this as a business.
translation.it: è che per loro questo era davvero lavoro.

translation.en: [Rosello] We referred to the organization as "the company." It was run like any other business.
translation.it: L'organizzazione per noi era l'azienda. La gestivamo come una qualsiasi attività.

translation.en: You're not running a drug empire. You're running a legitimate corporation.
translation.it: Non gestisci un impero della droga. Gestisci una multinazionale.

translation.en: And one of the products is cocaine.
translation.it: E uno dei prodotti è la cocaina.

translation.en: We're nothing more than the Kennedys of the 21st century.
translation.it: Siamo i Kennedy del ventunesimo secolo.

translation.en: Basically, it's a Fortune 500 company run by a bunch of muchachos.
translation.it: In pratica, è un'azienda Fortune 500 gestita da un gruppo di muchachos.

translation.en: [DeFede] It was like "Muchachos Inc."
translation.it: Era la Muchachos Spa.

translation.en: Ralph Linero was vice president of air operations.
translation.it: Ralph Linero era il vicepresidente delle operazioni aeree.

translation.en: Juan Barroso was the vice president of boats.
translation.it: Juan Barroso era il vicepresidente delle barche.

translation.en: Justo Jay, a V.P. of distribution.
translation.it: Justo Jay, quello della distribuzione.

translation.en: Willy's brother, Taby, was like an executive vice president.
translation.it: Il fratello di Willy, Taby, era il vicepresidente esecutivo.

translation.en: And Willy and Sal, they were the CEOs.
translation.it: E Willy e Sal erano gli amministratori delegati.

translation.en: Willy was more of a schmoozer.
translation.it: Willy era più un affabulatore.

translation.en: He was the one who would work the edges and the personalities, made the connections.
translation.it: Smussava gli spigoli, stringeva legami con personalità e contatti.

translation.en: Then Sal would come in and actually negotiate the finer points of business.
translation.it: Poi entrava in scena Sal per rifinire le negoziazioni.

translation.en: That's the way Sal wanted it. He wanted the focus always to be on Willy.
translation.it: Era quello che voleva Sal. Voleva i riflettori puntati su Willy.

translation.en: In case something happened, Willy would go down and he wouldn't.
translation.it: Se fosse successo qualcosa, Willy sarebbe caduto, e lui no.

translation.en: [Rosello] Sal was taught numbers and the business.
translation.it: Sal imparò conti e affari.

translation.en: [Linero] Sal was an accounting wizard.
translation.it: Sal era un mago della contabilità.

translation.en: [DeFede] He's making sure payments are being made on a regular basis,
translation.it: Si accertava che i pagamenti fossero regolari,

translation.en: that the organization kept moving, kept running, kept operating.
translation.it: che l'organizzazione andasse avanti, che fosse operativa.

translation.en: That was Sal's responsibility.
translation.it: Era responsabilità di Sal.

translation.en: That's why they worked. You need an enforcer and you need a good guy.
translation.it: Ecco perché funzionavano. Servono un sicario e un bravo ragazzo.

translation.en: Sal would use La Finquita, the farm in Miami, as the corporate headquarters.
translation.it: Sal usava La Finquita, la fattoria di Miami, come sede centrale.

translation.en: [Linero] Sal had a tiger there.
translation.it: Sal lì teneva una tigre.

translation.en: We had a room full of short-wave radios to communicate with Colombia.
translation.it: C'era una stanza piena di radio a onde corte per parlare con la Colombia.

translation.en: [Rosello] Every six months, he would have everybody gathered there, all the clients.
translation.it: Ogni sei mesi, riuniva lì tutti i clienti.

translation.en: I used to keep a daily ledger of the money and the coke.
translation.it: Tenevo la contabilità giornaliera dei soldi e della coca.

translation.en: Everybody would be waiting there in the living room watching TV,
translation.it: Tutti aspettavano in salotto guardando la televisione,

translation.en: talking, taking hits, whatever.
translation.it: parlando, facendo dei tiri, cose così.

translation.en: [Linero] There was no board table. It was done with sweatsuits on.
translation.it: Non c'era un consiglio d'amministrazione. Erano tutti in tuta.

translation.en: [Rosello] They would call you one by one.
translation.it: Li chiamavano uno per volta.

translation.en: You walk in, you sit down in front of Sal. He's behind the desk.
translation.it: Entri, ti siedi davanti a Sal. È dietro la scrivania.

translation.en: They had la silla caliente, the hot chair.
translation.it: Avevano la silla caliente, la sedia che scotta.

translation.en: 'Cause once you sit there, the truth has to come out. You can't fuck around.
translation.it: Perché quando ti siedi lì, la verità deve venire fuori. Non si scherza.

translation.en: Sal had the books, the ledgers, and he'll let you know how much money you owe
translation.it: Sal aveva i libri, i registri, e ti diceva quanti soldi dovevi,

translation.en: and the merchandise that you've taken and all that.
translation.it: la merce che avevi preso e tutto il resto.

translation.en: Sal and his books. He ran it like a legit business.
translation.it: Sal e i suoi registri. Come in un'azienda regolare.

translation.en: [reporter] You guys are making it sound like a Sunday drive.
translation.it: Lo fate sembrare una gita della domenica.

translation.en: Oh, yes, it was nice.
translation.it: Sì, è stato bello.

translation.en: [DeFede] The hardest thing about being a drug dealer in Miami in the '70s and early '80s was what to do with the money.
translation.it: Uno spacciatore a Miami tra gli anni '70 e '80 non sapeva cosa fare coi soldi.

translation.en: I had ten million dollars in a big… Like a U-Haul box inside the closet.
translation.it: Avevo dieci milioni in uno scatolone da traslochi nell'armadio.

translation.en: My mom told this friend from the family, "I wanna clean Pegy's room."
translation.it: Mia madre disse a un'amica: "Voglio pulire la stanza di Pegy.

translation.en: "There's this big box I need to move. I need you to help me."
translation.it: Ma mi devi aiutare a spostare uno scatolone".

translation.en: They open the closet, both of them are pulling and tugging on the box.
translation.it: Aprirono l'armadio, tirarono la scatola per spostarla,

translation.en: The box breaks, all this money falls.
translation.it: la ruppero, i soldi caddero.

translation.en: My mom sees that. Boom, she's fainted on the floor.
translation.it: Mia madre li vide e svenne sul colpo.

translation.en: "What the hell is this? There's all this money in your closet."
translation.it: "Cosa diavolo sono tutti quei soldi nel tuo armadio?

translation.en: "Your mom just fainted. We were trying to move the box."
translation.it: Tua madre è svenuta. Volevamo spostare la scatola."

translation.en: [DeFede] The money was the biggest problem.
translation.it: I soldi erano un problema.

translation.en: You can only box it up and keep it in your basement for so long.
translation.it: Potevamo solo inscatolarli e tenerli in cantina.

translation.en: Falcon and Magluta had purchased a great number of properties
translation.it: Falcon e Magluta avevano comprato un gran numero di proprietà.

translation.en: and had used their fathers, their respective fathers,
translation.it: E avevano usato i loro padri, i loro rispettivi padri,

translation.en: to act as presidents of construction companies
translation.it: come presidenti di società edili

translation.en: that built apartment buildings in the Miami area.
translation.it: che costruivano condomini nella zona di Miami.

translation.en: [Rosello] They used to live in mansions, vacation homes, and Vail.
translation.it: Vivevano in ville, case vacanze e a Vail.

translation.en: Sal had an apartment in Brickell Key, we used to call it Scarface.
translation.it: Sal aveva un appartamento a Brickell Key che chiamavamo "Scarface".

translation.en: We would go out and party and Sal gave us an extra key.
translation.it: Uscivamo a divertirci a Sal ci dava la chiave.

translation.en: After clubbing and stuff, we would go and hang out at Scarface.
translation.it: Dopo la discoteca, andavamo a Scarface.

translation.en: They will go out to party at a club or whatever to spend 20, 30 grand a night.
translation.it: Nei locali spendevano 20 o 30 mila dollari a notte.

translation.en: That was like, nothing.
translation.it: Come se niente fosse.

translation.en: Willy and Sal, they used to party at The Mutiny all the time.
translation.it: Willy e Sal andavano sempre al The Mutiny.

translation.en: [Bonachea] If you were anybody, you'd be at The Mutiny.
translation.it: Se eri qualcuno, andavi al The Mutiny.

translation.en: That's where every drug dealer went.
translation.it: Ci andavano tutti gli spacciatori.

translation.en: [Linero] I would describe The Mutiny as the Wall Street
translation.it: Il The Mutiny era la Wall Street

translation.en: of cocaine business in the '80s.
translation.it: del business della cocaina negli anni '80.

translation.en: That's where everything happened.
translation.it: Era lì che succedeva tutto.

translation.en: It was not my thing.
translation.it: Non faceva per me.

translation.en: Too many fools. Cocaine on the fucking tables
translation.it: Troppi idioti. Cocaina sui tavoli,

translation.en: with the women all around. What are you, crazy?
translation.it: circondati da donne. Siete pazzi?

translation.en: [Linero] We had a way to let other organizations know that we had material.
translation.it: Avevamo un modo per far sapere alle altre organizzazioni che avevamo del materiale.

translation.en: We would get a Burger King hat. We would put it on the table.
translation.it: Mettevamo sul tavolo un copricapo di Burger King.

translation.en: That was a sign to everybody in the club that, "Hey, we got material."
translation.it: Era un segnale per chi era nel locale: "Ehi, abbiamo il materiale.

translation.en: "Let's talk."
translation.it: Parliamone".

translation.en: I went looking for Willy to get me my money.
translation.it: Cercai Willy per farmi dare i miei soldi.

translation.en: And they had a party at The Mutiny. They were celebrating Cabeza's birthday.
translation.it: Erano a una festa al The Mutiny. Era il compleanno di Cabeza.

translation.en: And I found Willy, Sal, and Jay
translation.it: E trovai Willy, Sal e Jay

translation.en: stoned out of their minds in a room at the hotel.
translation.it: completamente sballati in una stanza dell'hotel.

translation.en: And there was three girls in the bed, naked.
translation.it: C'erano tre ragazze nel letto, nude.

translation.en: So I said, "The girls or the money?" So I jumped right in.
translation.it: Mi chiesi: "I soldi o le ragazze?" E saltai dentro al letto.

translation.en: [Rosello] Willy and Sal were married, but you have money,
translation.it: Willy e Sal erano sposati, ma con tutti quei soldi

translation.en: you wanna go out, party with your friends.
translation.it: ti vuoi divertire con gli amici.

translation.en: You think your wife… She could get mad for a day or two.
translation.it: Tua moglie si arrabbierà per un paio di giorni.

translation.en: You get home, you give her 30, 40, 50 grand
translation.it: Torni a casa, le dai 30, 40, 50 mila e la mandi a fare shopping.

translation.en: and you tell her, "Go shopping." She's not gonna be mad at you anymore.
translation.it: Torni a casa, le dai 30, 40, 50 mila e la mandi a fare shopping. Non sarà più arrabbiata con te.

translation.en: [Linero] If they had a boat race, I would fly either the mistress or the wife
translation.it: Se avevano una gara, portavo in volo l'amante o la moglie,

translation.en: and then the mistress would go on another plane in another hotel.
translation.it: e poi l'amante andava in un altro albergo con un altro aereo.

translation.en: It was a comedy of errors sometimes.
translation.it: Sembrava una commedia degli equivoci.

translation.en: [Rosello] Outside his marriage, Willy had kids with this girl.
translation.it: Fuori dal matrimonio, Willy aveva dei figli con questa ragazza.

translation.en: They had twins.
translation.it: Due gemelli.

translation.en: "Here's $50,000 to go shopping." I guess that probably cost Willy probably a million. [chuckles]
translation.it: Altro che 50.000 $ per fare shopping. Quello a Willy sarà costato un milione.

translation.en: [DeFede] These two guys were running the place. Everywhere you went, it was Willy and Sal.
translation.it: Erano i padroni del posto. Ovunque andassi, c'erano Willy e Sal.

translation.en: [Rosello] If you didn't know Willy and Sal personally,
translation.it: Se non conoscevi Willy e Sal,

translation.en: you knew someone that knew someone that knew Willy and Sal.
translation.it: conoscevi qualcuno che conosceva qualcuno che li conosceva.

translation.en: All of Miami considered them local heroes
translation.it: Tutta Miami li considerava eroi locali

translation.en: because they were like Robin Hoods. They always shared their wealth.
translation.it: perché erano come Robin Hood. Condividevano sempre la loro ricchezza.

translation.en: [Rosello] At Miami High, I was on the basketball team.
translation.it: Al liceo di Miami, ero nella squadra di basket.

translation.en: Whatever the team needed, they got it.
translation.it: Se alla squadra serviva qualcosa, ci pensavano loro.

translation.en: I mean, you go to them, "I need 30 grand, 40 grand to put my kid through college."
translation.it: Andavi da loro: "Mi servono 30 o 40 mila per mandare mio figlio al college".

translation.en: "What do you need, 30? Here's 50."
translation.it: "Te ne servono 30? Eccone 50."

translation.en: They helped everybody.
translation.it: Aiutavano tutti.

translation.en: [Bonachea] I hadn't seen Sal since 1979.
translation.it: Non vedevo Sal dal 1979.

translation.en: Sal called me, he said, "I wanna see you tonight."
translation.it: Mi chiamò e mi disse: "Voglio vederti stasera.

translation.en: He says, "Do you remember what car I was driving when we last were together?"
translation.it: Ricordi che macchina avevo l'ultima volta che ci siamo visti?"

translation.en: I said, "Yeah, you were driving a blue Challenger."
translation.it: "Certo, guidavi una Challenger blu."

translation.en: And he says, "Okay. Watch what I'm gonna pick you up in."
translation.it: "Ok. Guarda con cosa ti vengo a prendere."

translation.en: He came and he picked me up and he's in a Rolls-Royce.
translation.it: Venne a prendermi ed era in una Rolls Royce.

translation.en: We were out in the Rolls
translation.it: Eravamo nella Rolls

translation.en: and we were going through…
translation.it: e attraversavamo…

translation.en: You know Coconut Grove has a bad neighborhood on one side?
translation.it: Coconut Grove ha un brutto quartiere, accanto.

translation.en: And Sal goes, "You see all these people? I support them."
translation.it: E Sal disse: "Vedi tutta questa gente? Li aiuto io.

translation.en: "They get all their drugs from me." I said, "Great."
translation.it: Prendono la droga da me." Risposi: "Fantastico".

translation.en: Then right behind us, I see sirens. And I go, "Oh, man."
translation.it: Poi, dietro di noi, vedo le sirene. Dissi: "Oh, cavolo".

translation.en: I think he had a couple of keys in the back.
translation.it: Penso che avesse un paio di chili con sé.

translation.en: So I go, "Okay. We're all going to jail today."
translation.it: Dissi: "Oggi andremo tutti in galera".

translation.en: There were two cops. They come out of the car.
translation.it: C'erano due poliziotti. Scesero dall'auto.

translation.en: They looked at Sal and never said,
translation.it: Guardarono Sal

translation.en: "Can I have your driver's license?" or anything. They knew who he was.
translation.it: e non gli chiesero patente o documenti. Sapevano chi era.

translation.en: Sal says, "Look, we'll do a trade. You take the keys and you let me go."
translation.it: Sal disse: "Facciamo uno scambio. Prendetevi la coca e me ne vado".

translation.en: And the cops turn around and said, "It was nice running into you."
translation.it: I poliziotti si girarono e dissero: "È stato bello incontrarti".

translation.en: Took the two keys and took off.
translation.it: Presero i due chili e via.

translation.en: And that was the end of that and I was like… [gasps]
translation.it: L'episodio finì lì e io pensai: "Oh".

translation.en: [DeFede] In a lot of ways, Willy and Sal, in their world, in their community…
translation.it: Per molti versi, Willy e Sal, nel loro mondo, nella loro comunità,

translation.en: More popular than Gloria Estefan and Miami Sound Machine.
translation.it: erano più popolari di Gloria Estefan e i Miami Sound Machine.

translation.en: [DeFede] They were the kings of cocaine in South Florida.
translation.it: Erano i re della coca nel sud della Florida.

translation.en: [Posada] They were grossing 20, 30 million every month.
translation.it: Incassavano 20, 30 milioni al mese.

translation.en: I told Willy, "You already have over 100 million dollars.
translation.it: Dissi a Willy: "Hai già più di 100 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: Why don't you quit?"
translation.it: Perché non smetti?"

translation.en: And he said, "Until I get to a billion,
translation.it: Rispose: "Finché non avrò un miliardo

translation.en: I'm not gonna quit."
translation.it: non smetterò".

translation.en: The Miami area has the highest murder rate per capita in the country.
translation.it: La zona di Miami ha il più alto tasso di omicidi pro capite del Paese.

translation.en: [reporter 1] The rate of killing here is accelerating, the efficient work of the Cocaine Cowboys.
translation.it: Il tasso di uccisioni accelera per opera dei cowboy della cocaina.

translation.en: [reporter 2] Local homicide detectives say Miami's in the middle of a narcotics war
translation.it: La polizia dice che Miami è al centro di una guerra per la droga

translation.en: between Colombian and Cuban drug dealers.
translation.it: tra trafficanti colombiani e cubani.

translation.en: [DeFede] The violence, the shootings, the police were totally overwhelmed
translation.it: La violenza, le sparatorie. La polizia era sopraffatta,

translation.en: and so they focused their limited resources on the violent drug dealers.
translation.it: e concentrò le sue limitate risorse sugli spacciatori violenti.

translation.en: The ones who were embarrassing them because of headlines in the newspapers.
translation.it: Quelli che li mettevano in imbarazzo per i titoli dei giornali.

translation.en: But not Willy and Sal.
translation.it: Ma non Willy e Sal.

translation.en: [Clark] Falcon and Magluta, they weren't necessarily on the radar screen.
translation.it: Falcon e Magluta non erano necessariamente sullo schermo radar.

translation.en: They were the nonviolent drug dealers.
translation.it: Erano spacciatori non violenti.

translation.en: [Linero] If I would say, "Hey, I lost a load."
translation.it: Se avessi detto: "Ho perso un carico",

translation.en: I wouldn't be in fear of say, "Hey, I don't want to get killed."
translation.it: non avrei avuto paura di essere ucciso.

translation.en: My word was just good enough for them.
translation.it: La mia parola era sufficiente, per loro.

translation.en: [DeFede] It wasn't about retaliation. It was about taking care of business.
translation.it: Non c'erano ritorsioni. Era per il bene degli affari. La violenza attira più attenzione.

translation.en: Violence attracts more attention to you. That's not what they wanted.
translation.it: Era per il bene degli affari. La violenza attira più attenzione. Non è quello che volevano.

translation.en: You're in the drug business and when you're that big, of course it's dangerous.
translation.it: Se sei un pesce grosso nel giro della droga, è ovvio che sia pericoloso.

translation.en: Kind of a stressful lifestyle, but…
translation.it: È una vita stressante, ma…

translation.en: The sport itself isn't dangerous as long as you're well-prepared,
translation.it: Come sport non è pericoloso, se sei preparato,

translation.en: you got a good crew, and they're all working together.
translation.it: hai un buon equipaggio e collaborano tutti.

translation.en: You… I don't see any danger in it.
translation.it: Non vedo alcun pericolo.

translation.en: [reporter 1] A federal task force is helping Florida
translation.it: Una task force federale aiuta la Florida

translation.en: reduce the drug tide, now estimated at seven billion dollars a year.
translation.it: a ridurre la marea della droga, stimata in sette miliardi all'anno.

translation.en: [reporter 2] Cocaine seizures are up.
translation.it: I sequestri di cocaina sono aumentati.

translation.en: 12,000 pounds of coke seized in 1983,
translation.it: Cinque tonnellate e mezza sequestrate nel 1983,

translation.en: compared with 44,000 pounds of coke taken last year.
translation.it: contro le 20 tonnellate dell'anno scorso.

translation.en: Drugs weren't coming in like they used to.
translation.it: Le droghe non arrivavano più come prima.

translation.en: [reporter 2] The efforts by the Drug Task Force has officials in other parts of the country
translation.it: Il lavoro dell'antidroga fa sì che in altre zone del Paese la polizia

translation.en: saying now they have increased problems with drug smugglers
translation.it: rilevi più problemi con i narcotrafficanti

translation.en: moving marijuana and cocaine through other places.
translation.it: che spostano marijuana e cocaina in altri posti.

translation.en: Places away from Miami.
translation.it: Lontano da Miami.

translation.en: That put a stop on the operation, and then it was,
translation.it: L'operazione si dovette fermare,

translation.en: "We gotta go back to plan B."
translation.it: e passammo al piano B.

translation.en: Plan B was to move to California.
translation.it: Cioè, trasferirci in California.

translation.en: [Rosello] In '85, Willy and Sal, they left to L.A.
translation.it: Nel '85, Willy e Sal andarono a Los Angeles.

translation.en: [Clark] They set up shop in Marina del Rey, an affluent suburb of Los Angeles.
translation.it: Stabilirono gli affari a Marina del Rey, un ricco sobborgo di Los Angeles.

translation.en: Willy's like, "Stay in L.A., count money, start working for the company,
translation.it: Willy disse: "Vieni a Los Angeles a contare i soldi per 5000 dollari a settimana".

translation.en: I'll pay you $5,000 a week."
translation.it: "Vieni a Los Angeles a contare i soldi per 5000 dollari a settimana".

translation.en: California was the equivalent of Miami at that time.
translation.it: La California era l'equivalente di Miami a quel tempo.

translation.en: Drugs were being transported across the southwestern border.
translation.it: Le droghe arrivavano attraverso il confine a sud-ovest.

translation.en: [Rosello] The difference between East and West Coast,
translation.it: C'era una differenza tra le due coste:

translation.en: East, you bring it up by plane and speedboats.
translation.it: in quella est, portavi la droga su aerei e motoscafi,

translation.en: West Coast, tractor trailers.
translation.it: in quella ovest, sui tir.

translation.en: I think that once everything started in L.A. in '85, things got out of control.
translation.it: Quando tutto iniziò a Los Angeles, nel 1985, le cose sfuggirono di mano.

translation.en: They were bringing in anywhere from three to five thousand keys
translation.it: Portavano da tremila a cinquemila chili

translation.en: on a monthly basis.
translation.it: ogni mese.

translation.en: [Clark] Because of their high-living lifestyle, this drew the attention of bystanders
translation.it: Il loro stile di vita sopra le righe attirò l'attenzione degli osservatori,

translation.en: and information was related to
translation.it: e l'informazione fu passata

translation.en: the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department, Narcotics Squad.
translation.it: all'ufficio dello sceriffo e alla squadra antidroga.

translation.en: They executed a raid and discovered
translation.it: Fecero un'irruzione e scoprirono

translation.en: a treasure trove of incriminating evidence.
translation.it: un tesoro di prove incriminanti.

translation.en: Large amount of cash, three kilograms of cocaine,
translation.it: Grandi quantità di contanti, tre chili di cocaina,

translation.en: fake identification.
translation.it: documenti falsi. In base a tutto ciò,

translation.en: And based upon that bust, Falcon and Magluta,
translation.it: documenti falsi. In base a tutto ciò, Falcon e Magluta, sotto le loro presunte identità,

translation.en: under their assumed identities,
translation.it: Falcon e Magluta, sotto le loro presunte identità,

translation.en: were arrested again on state trafficking charges.
translation.it: furono nuovamente arrestati per spaccio.

translation.en: They were issued bond under their fake names.
translation.it: Furono arrestati sotto i loro nomi falsi.

translation.en: Law enforcement wasn't really in tune with how to capture
translation.it: La polizia non capiva come catturare e perseguire questi tizi.

translation.en: and go after these guys.
translation.it: non capiva come catturare e perseguire questi tizi.

translation.en: They'd get arrested. You just change your ID, get new driver's licenses, you skip bail.
translation.it: Se li arrestavano, cambiavano i documenti e scappavano dopo la cauzione.

translation.en: And that's what they ended up doing.
translation.it: Fecero così anche loro. Furono rilasciati su cauzione

translation.en: Once you make bond in L.A., they're gone.
translation.it: Fecero così anche loro. Furono rilasciati su cauzione e sparirono. Tornarono a Miami.

translation.en: They're back in Miami.
translation.it: e sparirono. Tornarono a Miami.

translation.en: [Clark] The Los Angeles Sheriff happened to be watching ESPN,
translation.it: Lo sceriffo di Los Angeles stava guardando la ESPN

translation.en: which was broadcasting a powerboat race and there, lo and behold, was Sal Magluta,
translation.it: che trasmetteva una gara di motoscafi e lì, sorpresa, c'era Sal Magluta,

translation.en: aka, Angelo Maretto, being interviewed having won a powerboat race.
translation.it: alias Angelo Maretto, intervistato dopo aver vinto una gara di motoscafi.

translation.en: Sal Magluta, last year's national champion,
translation.it: Sal Magluta, campione nazionale l'anno scorso,

translation.en: very close to being last year's world champion.
translation.it: quasi campione del mondo.

translation.en: [DeFede] "That's not Sal Magluta. That's Angelo Maretto!
translation.it: Non è Sal Magluta. Quello è Angelo Maretto!

translation.en: I know that guy!"
translation.it: Lo conosco!

translation.en: The sheriff was floored by this news that the fugitive from the state of California,
translation.it: Lo sceriffo restò sbigottito quando scoprì che il fuggitivo della California

translation.en: that he was searching for, wound up in Florida.
translation.it: che lui stava cercando, era in Florida.

translation.en: [DeFede] This was the guy who got away and yet here he is on ESPN
translation.it: È il tizio che è scappato, eppure eccolo sulla ESPN

translation.en: for the whole world to see just living large.
translation.it: per mostrare al mondo che vive in grande stile.

translation.en: Are you crazy?
translation.it: Sei impazzito?

translation.en: Aren't you ever satisfied? You got a brand-new boat.
translation.it: Non sei mai soddisfatto? Hai una barca nuova.

translation.en: No, every year, everybody comes out with faster things,
translation.it: No, ogni anno tutti hanno barche più veloci,

translation.en: so you have to try to stay up there.
translation.it: devo essere alla loro altezza.

translation.en: [Clark] In 1979, Falcon and Magluta had already been charged and convicted
translation.it: Nel 1979, Falcon e Magluta erano già stati accusati e condannati

translation.en: in the state of Florida in the Operation Video Canary case.
translation.it: dallo stato della Florida nell'operazione Video Canary.

translation.en: When, in 1987, the board rejected various appeals,
translation.it: Quando, nel 1987, il tribunale respinse vari appelli,

translation.en: they were expected to surrender to serve their 14-month sentence.
translation.it: avrebbero dovuto costituirsi e scontare la condanna a 14 mesi.

translation.en: That, he did not.
translation.it: Non fu così.

translation.en: They were now wanted in the state of Florida.
translation.it: Ora erano ricercati in Florida.

translation.en: [DeFede] Prosecutors, DEA, state, local cops,
translation.it: I procuratori, l'antidroga, la polizia locale,

translation.en: all wanted to know where Willy and Sal were.
translation.it: volevano sapere dove fossero Willy e Sal.

translation.en: But by 1987, they stopped racing boats.
translation.it: Ma nel 1987 smisero di gareggiare.

translation.en: They moved out of their houses and rented new places under fake names.
translation.it: Cambiarono casa usando nomi falsi.

translation.en: They were still smuggling cocaine,
translation.it: Trafficavano ancora la coca,

translation.en: but they were trying to keep a low profile.
translation.it: ma cercavano di mantenere un profilo basso.

translation.en: [Clark] Because they had continued to traffic in drugs throughout the 1980s,
translation.it: Poiché avevano continuato i loro affari durante tutti gli anni '80,

translation.en: pretty much unabated for well over ten years,
translation.it: praticamente senza sosta per oltre dieci anni,

translation.en: they acquired this legendary status within the drug trade.
translation.it: acquisirono uno status leggendario nel traffico di droga.

translation.en: [DeFede] This was the holy grail
translation.it: Erano il Santo Graal

translation.en: for any cop trying to bring down a dope ring.
translation.it: per chi voleva smantellare il giro della droga.

translation.en: [man] March 30, 1988…
translation.it: Il 30 marzo 1988…

translation.en: myself and my partner, Jorge Plasencia,
translation.it: io e il mio partner, Jorge Plasencia,

translation.en: we go to Dolphin Office Supply on Southwest 27th Avenue.
translation.it: andammo alla Dolphin Articoli per ufficio, sulla 27esima Strada.

translation.en: I'm shopping. I'm looking.
translation.it: Facevo acquisti, guardavo.

translation.en: And the next thing I know,
translation.it: E di colpo,

translation.en: I feel Jorge Plasencia tugging at my shirt.
translation.it: sentii che Jorge mi tirava per la camicia.

translation.en: And he goes…
translation.it: Mi disse: "È Sal.

translation.en: [whispers] "That's Sal. That's Sal Magluta."
translation.it: Mi disse: "È Sal. "È Sal Magluta".

translation.en: Sal is in a store, buying some ledgers.
translation.it: Sal sta comprando dei libri contabili.

translation.en: He's a fugitive, and who does he happen to run into,
translation.it: È un latitante, e gli capita di imbattersi

translation.en: but a guy he went to high school with who's a Miami detective.
translation.it: in un ex compagno di liceo, un detective di Miami.

translation.en: They went to school together at Miami High.
translation.it: Erano andati al liceo insieme.

translation.en: We knew that Sal was wanted. In fact, we had his last known booking photo
translation.it: Sapevamo che Sal era ricercato. Anzi, avevamo il suo avviso

translation.en: in our visor in the car.
translation.it: nella visiera dell'auto.

translation.en: He's a big fish.
translation.it: È un pesce grosso.

translation.en: It's a big one. [laughs]
translation.it: È bello grosso.

translation.en: He walked outside, I drew my gun, and I put it behind his head,
translation.it: Lui uscì, io estrassi la pistola, gliela puntai alla testa e dissi: "Sal, non muoverti. Sei in arresto".

translation.en: and I said, "Sal, don't move. You're under arrest."
translation.it: gliela puntai alla testa e dissi: "Sal, non muoverti. Sei in arresto".

translation.en: He goes, "I'm sorry. I don't know what you're talking about. That's not my name."
translation.it: Disse: "Mi dispiace. Non so di cosa parli. Non mi chiamo così".

translation.en: Sal tries to play dumb like, "Oh, no. That's not me, I'm somebody else."
translation.it: Sal prova a fare lo scemo: "Oh no. Non sono io, sono qualcun altro".

translation.en: Sure enough, he's got a driver's license with somebody else's name,
translation.it: Certo, ha la patente con il nome di qualcun altro,

translation.en: I look at him and I go, "Sal, look over there."
translation.it: Gli dissi: "Sal, guarda laggiù".

translation.en: And across the other side of the car was Jorge Plasencia.
translation.it: E dall'altra parte della macchina c'era Jorge Plasencia.

translation.en: I go, "My partner went to high school with you, Sal."
translation.it: "Il mio partner è andato al liceo con te, Sal."

translation.en: "I know it's you, Sal! Sal, we went to high school together! I know it's you!"
translation.it: "So che sei tu, Sal! Siamo andati al liceo insieme, so chi sei!"

translation.en: We put him in the car. I said, "Sal, it's not a problem,
translation.it: Lo facemmo salire in macchina. "Sal, tranquillo,

translation.en: we'll have you fingerprinted."
translation.it: ti prenderemo le impronte."

translation.en: He didn't even break a sweat.
translation.it: Non batté ciglio. Disse: "Vi state sbagliando.

translation.en: He said, "You're making a mistake. I'm sure we can clear this up."
translation.it: Non batté ciglio. Disse: "Vi state sbagliando. Sono sicuro che chiariremo tutto". Parlava come un uomo d'affari.

translation.en: He's talking like a businessman.
translation.it: Sono sicuro che chiariremo tutto". Parlava come un uomo d'affari.

translation.en: [announcer] It's drama on the high seas with the Seahawk racing team.
translation.it: È un dramma in alto mare per il team Seahawk.

translation.en: They had it going so well up to that point.
translation.it: Erano andati così bene fino a quel punto.

translation.en: So halfway to the police department,
translation.it: A metà strada dalla centrale

translation.en: he goes, "Okay."
translation.it: disse: "Ok.

translation.en: "It's me."
translation.it: Sono io.

translation.en: "You got me. Let's make a deal. I can take you, right now, to a house
translation.it: Mi avete preso. Facciamo un patto. Posso portarvi subito in una casa

translation.en: that has 1,000 kilograms of cocaine. That's like a ton.
translation.it: dove ci sono 1000 chili di cocaina. È una tonnellata.

translation.en: You can have it.
translation.it: Potete prenderla.

translation.en: Just let me go."
translation.it: Ma lasciatemi andare".

translation.en: [announcer] This is a very serious situation.
translation.it: Questa è una situazione molto seria.

translation.en: I believe that boat is starting to sink. They just pulled out their life raft.
translation.it: Credo che la barca stia per affondare. Hanno tirato fuori la zattera.

translation.en: [Alvarez] The street level of that was worth in excess of 25 million dollars.
translation.it: Venduta per strada valeva più di 25 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: So he's offering me a bribe of 25 million dollars.
translation.it: Quindi mi stava offrendo una mazzetta da 25 milioni.

translation.en: I said, "Sal, I'm sorry, I can't help you. I appreciate the offer."
translation.it: Dissi: "Sal, mi dispiace, grazie, ma non posso aiutarti".

translation.en: He had no fear.
translation.it: Non aveva paura.

translation.en: He had no fear at all of losing his liberty.
translation.it: Non aveva paura di perdere la libertà.

translation.en: I don't think I grasped that
translation.it: Ma non avevo capito

translation.en: the way I should've.
translation.it: il vero perché.

translation.en: We walk him over to the jail. Process him.
translation.it: Lo portammo in prigione. Lo registrammo.

translation.en: Put him in.
translation.it: Entrò in cella.

translation.en: Back in 1988, nothing really was computerized.
translation.it: Nel lontano 1988 niente era informatizzato.

translation.en: All the prisoner's names were in 3x5 index cards.
translation.it: I nomi dei prigionieri erano scritti su schede 3x5.

translation.en: Almost like your grandmother would have her recipes on.
translation.it: Era il modo in cui la nonna conservava le ricette.

translation.en: And they would put in there whether they had bond or no bond.
translation.it: E c'era scritto se avevano la cauzione o no.

translation.en: Sal's situation is he's got no bond.
translation.it: Sal non aveva la cauzione.

translation.en: The only thing he needs to do is serve his sentence,
translation.it: Poteva solo scontare la condanna,

translation.en: so he's not getting bond.
translation.it: non avrebbe avuto cauzione.

translation.en: He needs to serve his time. We put no bond and we left.
translation.it: Doveva scontare la pena. Scrivemmo niente cauzione e andammo via.

translation.en: And we think
translation.it: Pensammo

translation.en: this is the end of Sal.
translation.it: che per Sal fosse finita.

translation.en: A few days later, we go back to get him to try to cooperate.
translation.it: Qualche giorno dopo, tornammo per convincerlo a collaborare.

translation.en: We go to the front desk, we said, "Bring down Salvador Magluta."
translation.it: Andammo in ufficio e dicemmo: "Portate giù Salvador Magluta".

translation.en: They look through the index card.
translation.it: Cercarono la scheda.

translation.en: "We don't have anybody here by that name."
translation.it: "Non c'è nessuno con quel nome."

translation.en: "I don't understand."
translation.it: "Non capisco."

translation.en: "We brought him here Friday. He's got no bond. He's going to prison. Where is he?"
translation.it: "L'abbiamo portato venerdì. Non ha la cauzione. Dov'è?"

translation.en: He said, "He's not here."
translation.it: "Qui non c'è."

translation.en: I said, "What do you mean he's not here? Find him. He's here. We brought him here."
translation.it: "Come sarebbe? Cercatelo. È qui. Lo abbiamo portato noi."

translation.en: He was let out the day before.
translation.it: "È stato rilasciato ieri."

translation.en: I go, "He couldn't have been. He couldn't have been!
translation.it: Dissi: "Non doveva essere rilasciato.

translation.en: He's got no bond."
translation.it: Non ha la cauzione".

translation.en: And then they find the card.
translation.it: E poi trovarono la scheda.

translation.en: Time served and was released.
translation.it: Aveva scontato la pena ed era stato rilasciato.

translation.en: I go, "He couldn't have served his time.
translation.it: Dissi: "Non è possibile.

translation.en: He was a fugitive. He needs to go to prison."
translation.it: Era un latitante. Deve andare in prigione".

translation.en: [DeFede] Somehow, the paperwork at the county jail, well, something happened
translation.it: Qualcosa era accaduto con i documenti della prigione della contea,

translation.en: and instead of it showing that Sal owed them 14 months,
translation.it: e invece di dire che Sal doveva scontare 14 mesi,

translation.en: it showed he'd already served his 14 months.
translation.it: dicevano che li aveva già scontati.

translation.en: So they pat him on the back and walk him out the front door.
translation.it: Così lo accompagnarono gentilmente fuori.

translation.en: That's Miami.
translation.it: Ecco Miami.

translation.en: Sal called me and he says, "You know where I am?"
translation.it: Sal mi chiamò e mi disse: "Sai dove sono?" "Certo, in carcere."

translation.en: I said, "Yeah, in jail."
translation.it: "Sai dove sono?" "Certo, in carcere."

translation.en: He says, "No, I'm on the street."
translation.it: Disse: "No, sono libero".

translation.en: [Alvarez] We blew a gasket. It just so happens,
translation.it: Ci infuriammo. Casualmente, l'errore era successo con uno dei più importanti

translation.en: the mistake was made to one of the most prolific
translation.it: Casualmente, l'errore era successo con uno dei più importanti

translation.en: drug traffickers in US history. What's the chances of that?
translation.it: narcotrafficanti degli USA. Quante probabilità c'erano?

translation.en: To operate a company that big, you have to pay people off.
translation.it: Per gestire un'azienda così grande, devi pagare la gente. Avevano un sacco di gente sul libro paga.

translation.en: They had a lot of people on payroll.
translation.it: devi pagare la gente. Avevano un sacco di gente sul libro paga.

translation.en: [Bonachea] I said, "How'd you get out?"
translation.it: Gli chiesi: "Come sei uscito?"

translation.en: He says, "I did a favor for somebody that works at the jail."
translation.it: "Ho fatto un favore a qualcuno che lavora in carcere."

translation.en: They decided to return the favor
translation.it: Gli resero il favore

translation.en: and falsify his papers, so he could walk out.
translation.it: falsificando la sua scheda, così poté andarsene.

translation.en: [Clark] Again, for the third time, Sal Magluta is in the wind, no longer in custody
translation.it: Di nuovo, per la terza volta, Sal Magluta è uccel di bosco,

translation.en: when authorities had the opportunity to keep him in custody.
translation.it: eppure le autorità avrebbero potuto tenerlo dentro.

translation.en: Every time they got busted, they bounce back.
translation.it: Ogni volta che li beccano, reagiscono.

translation.en: And then they bounce back, and then they bounce back!
translation.it: E poi si riprendono.

translation.en: [announcer] Okay, the Seahawk Racing team, that's Sal Magluta.
translation.it: Ok, il team Seahawk, è Sal Magluta.

translation.en: That team is having some problems.
translation.it: Il team ha dei problemi.

translation.en: But Sal appears that he doesn't wanna stop.
translation.it: Ma sembra che Sal non voglia fermarsi.
